properties.description: Social afternoons with activities and chat over a cuppa. If you care for someone or just want to pop in to find out more, please feel welcome to join us in our warm space this winter.

hours._text: Mondays : Fabric and Frolics (Crafts) Group 1pm to 3pm Thursdays : Drop-in and Mans Group 3pm to 5pm

properties.title: Dochas Carers Centre

hours._text: Every Monday 12pm to 2pm . They will provide a warm friendly welcome, a cup of soup, hot drinks and other refreshments, free Wifi and charging points. There will be no charge to anyone who uses the Warm Space.

properties.description: The CAB in Lochgilphead can offer a warm space and small meeting rooms to local organisations this winter. Phone: 01546 605550 Email: [emailÂ protected] Or pop into the office for more information
properties.title: Citizens Advice Bureau - Lochgilphead

properties.description: Join at the Lochgair Hall, where the Lochgair Association is excited to provide a welcoming space for everyone to gather, chat, and unwind over a hot cup of tea, coffee, and a biscuit in their newly renovated hall. Explore the library and borrow books at the fantastic price of 50p. Additionally, try your hand at a jigsaw puzzle or other engaging games available. This space is yours, and they'd love your input for more activities during the warm gatherings.

hours._text: Every Thursday from 3 PM to 4:30 PM .

properties.title: Loch Gair Association
